statements: DELETE FROM golf_equipment WHERE club_type = 'Putter' AND brand = 'Titleist';

DELETE FROM balls WHERE availability = FALSE AND price < 50.00;
DELETE FROM accessories WHERE price > 50.00 AND availability = true;
DELETE FROM balls WHERE color = 'white' AND price > 50;
DELETE FROM balls WHERE ball_stock <= 10 AND ball_price > 50;
